mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task VALUES( task_seq.nextval, #{class_num}, #{title}, #{content}, #{question_file}, to_date(#{deadline},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24/MI'), 'n' )
mapper.select: SELECT num, class_num, title, content, question_file, deadline, is_closed FROM task where class_num = #{class_num}
SELECT num, class_num, title, content, question_file, deadline, is_closed FROM task WHERE num = #{num}
SELECT num, class_num, title, content, question_file, deadline, is_closed FROM task WHERE num = (SELECT MAX(num) FROM task)
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET is_closed = 'y' WHERE deadline < sysdate
mapper.select: SELECT input_answer, output_answer FROM task_Answer WHERE task_num = #{task_num}
